summary: Implements a neural radiance field model that leverages a TCNN encoder to map input coordinates into a high‑dimensional space, then uses separate MLPs to predict density (sigma) and appearance features, supporting configurable activation, bounding volume, optional blob density, and normal computation.
business_intent: Enable fast, GPU‑accelerated NeRF training and rendering for immersive 3D content creation, virtual reality, visual effects, and other applications requiring high‑quality view synthesis.
